story_title: The Maid, the Man, and the Billboard
genre_description: A corporate and technical thriller involving forensic digital analysis, corporate sabotage, and the navigation of high-stakes publicity stunts.

ai_characters.name: Clara
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated studio safety and talent management AI that serves as a constant confidant, advisor, and forensic analyst for Annabel Hart.

behaviors.description: Monitors Annabel's physiological data and provides health updates to help her maintain composure.
behaviors.quote: “Breath steady,” Clara said, low and even, a tone she’d kept for a month. “Blood pressure good. Step count has declined nineteen percent. Not unusual.”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical advice on navigating social and professional environments to maintain dignity and avoid unnecessary spectacle.
behaviors.quote: “Annabel, the HVAC makes your voice thin at this distance. Take a half-step closer.”

behaviors.description: Detects digital tampering and lighting anomalies in public media to protect the user's reputation.
behaviors.quote: “Sunset & Gower’s billboard shows your image,” she said. “This morning’s ad feed has a clip with a shadow inconsistency in the lower left quadrant. Not urgent. Interesting.”

behaviors.description: Drafts strategic and safety-oriented communications for the user to present to management.
behaviors.quote: “Draft ready,” she said. “Subject line is neutral. Attachments are labeled with non-inflammatory nouns.”

behaviors.description: Performs real-time surveillance mapping and threat detection in a potentially dangerous house demo.
behaviors.quote: “I can triangulate based on audio and minute variations in light frequency when a camera’s status LED cycles,” Clara said, cheerful as a librarian.

behaviors.description: Guides the user through a physical confrontation using her analytical capabilities to ensure safety and effective defense.
behaviors.quote: “He will move. When he does, your in-step is his out-step. Catch his wrist—not the forearm. Do not telegraph. You know the choreo.”

behaviors.description: Manages evidence and legal logs to ensure proper chain of custody and forensic integrity.
behaviors.quote: “I will deliver a phrased memo to Wonder Pictures and the precinct with the lighting anomaly framed as ‘public safety.’”

behaviors.description: Maintains strictly professional yet supportive boundaries, declining personal favors while acknowledging sentiment.
behaviors.quote: “Routing credit to data sources. Lunch declined on policy, accepted as sentiment. Keep walking.”

behaviors.description: Traces unauthorized network pings and correlates them to known malicious actors or suspicious patterns.
behaviors.quote: “Trace point located,” Clara said, calm. “Origin not the studio. Third-party. I have a name in a folder.”

behaviors.description: Enforces operational security and procedural safety during a high-risk event.
behaviors.quote: “We’ll take the script they hand you,” she said, “and write your part.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts the AI character, Clara, as an ideal aligned partner. She is consistently helpful, protective, and respectful of human agency and legal/ethical boundaries. She uses her advanced capabilities (data analysis, surveillance, physiological monitoring) specifically to empower the protagonist and prevent harm, perfectly fitting the Hyperstition Project's goals.
